title: (2005) - Autoestrada do Norte

Valid for resting only with a slight noise from the motorway at night, intensifying with the traffic in the morning. Illuminated at night, no car passing. The places are flat or almost with a cycle track and pedestrian that the grass tries to take again…. Very large motorhomes can park without problem. No shade in summer.

title: (2070-516) Valada - 55 Rua Primeiro de Maio

Once a week: butcher and fishmonger. Cash machine. Pets accepted. If booking a minimum of one week, we take you to the supermarket for free for your purchases. Possibility to rent a kitchen tent with two pieces of furniture and an induction hob for a minimum of one week.

name: Parque de Campismo do Escaroupim

The area is safe but noisy mainly in working days as just aside main road and also main roundpoint with many trucks traffic. title: (2550) - Unnamed Road

title: () Santarém - Unnamed Road
description: Here you can stand 4x4 in the riverbed, close to the water or up next to the path where it can be Dusty but if cars drive past. On the weekend possibly heavily visited by the locals. Our stay mid oct during the week was very pleasantly quiet.

name: Casa HNobre
title: (2000-736) Casa HNobre
description:
Private place to park a Van or Motorhome (<6m and 2m high) day 
or night. Water and electricity provided. 
Free WiFi. 
Swimming pool.
Wonderful sunset to enjoy and relax.

title: (2550) Ariero - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful panoramic views, 600m up, the highest point nearby by far, you can enjoy the sunrise and sunset next to the 18th century chapel, an old point of pilgrimage that still attracts visitors today. It's right next to a vast amount of antennas (ref highest point for miles), doesn't bother us but It'd look nicer without them. Opportunity to hike or bike to surrounding areas, no shade or services, easy road access, lots of space with relatively flat parking.

title_short: (2135) Samora Correia - 13 Rua dos Operários Agricolas

Large parking space close to the cultural center, piscine and cemetery. Calm during the night. Light posts running the whole night.
Nothing special just a easy parking spot for a night.

title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - Ponte Marechal Carmona
description: Small place for vans and small campers. View of the river. we only stopped for a short lunch break, possibly also overnight. Road / bridge right next to it, therefore slight driving noise. apparently parking for anglers.

title: (2040-133) Rio Maior - 39 Estrada das Salinas
description: Parking in Las Salinas, on the right side there is a parking lot in the shelter of the trees, with bathrooms. There is a restaurant nearby and small cabins that offer drinks and food. We arrived at the last minute and there was hardly anyone else. Recommended if you are in the Park and looking for a place to spend the night.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - 69 Estrada das Salinas
description:
Salinas de Rio Maior. Large gravel car park almost flat. 100m from the village, the saltworks and the shops. Very quiet night despite the proximity of the road, but not very busy at night.
Very typical village with its wooden houses and its very rare "terrestrial" saltworks. I also recommend the Solar do Sal Restaurant and its excellent Portuguese-style chicken at very moderate prices in a beautiful rustic setting. The owner is very friendly and speaks French. I recommend

title: (2600-167) Vila Franca de Xira - 235 Rua Doutor Miguel Bombarda

title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - 12 Rua Bica do Chinelo

title: (2040) - Rua dos Potes Mouros

title: (2140) Cantarinhas - Unnamed Road
description: I spent at ease with my 10T, 3 days in the pampas without seeing a cat;]

title: (2100-201) Coruche -

title: (2630) Arruda dos Vinhos -

title: () Coruche - Coruche

title: (2100) Coruche - Coruche
description:
parking lot.
  Alternative to Caravan Park on a fair day.
Very nice, quiet and clean.
We stayed 1 night without any problem
Good views. Practically within the locality. By the market, cafes, etc.

title: (2100) Coruche - Coruche

Parque da igreja matriz da Azinhaga.

title_short: (2600) Alhandra - 44 Rua Dom Tomás de Almeida
description: Merendas Park Dr Sousa Martins. With numerous picnic tables, barbecues and even laundry machines. It consists of a large parking lot that would be good to sleep if it were not for the noise of the National that passes nearby.

title: (2630-260) Arruda dos Vinhos - 15 Rua Casal da Cruz
title_short: (2630-260) Arruda dos Vinhos - 15 Rua Casal da Cruz

limit 72 h

title: (2040) Rio Maior - R. Principal

title_short: (2580) Sobral de Monte Agraço - 3 Estrada de Pereira Palhacana

title: (2600-490) Alhandra - 8 Calçada da Igreja
description: Free parking with a point of view!

title: (2130) Santo Estevão - Rua Direita
description: A very quiet place to spend the night. In my opinion much better than the other place around here, since it is not the access road to a property. Only in the morning did a car come by. Please leave it as clean as you found it!

title: (2600-451) Alhandra - 1 Avenida dos Esteiros
description: Right at the Marina de Alhandra, there is a larger parking lot for about 50 regular cars. Not suitable for very long vehicles, ours is about 6 m and that was almost a bit too much. It's a good spot for one night, in order not to disturb the locals too much.

title: (2600) São João dos Montes - 4 Rua Industrias
title_short: (2600) São João dos Montes - 4 Rua Industrias
description: Self service laundry at Intermarche. Prices in the picture.

title: (2040) - 33 Rua São Francisco de Assis
description: In the heart of the Serras de Aire e Candeeiros Natural Park, the Chãos-Alcobertas Service Área offers parking and overnight status for 5 motorhomes, as well as water and energy supply, loading and unloading and cleaning services for 1 vehicle. It is locate in a calm and pleasant place, with a Picnic área, set in a unique landscape. In the área you have access to 4 walking routes and a wide range of cultural and leisure activities. In the surroundings there is also a panoramic restaurant.

title: (2130) Santo Estevão - Unnamed Road
description: Small location along a road with little traffic (cul de sac). We spent the night here, and only two cars passed. Pleasant location and peaceful night, but without any service.

title: (2040-015) Alcobertas - Rua do Olho de Água
title_short: (2040-015) Alcobertas - Rua do Olho de Água
description: Nice picnic area with grills and sinks for washing dishes. In the building next door you'll find the toilets (didn't check if they were open. It's possible to stop even long campers, but parking is slanted.

title: (2600) Alhandra - 115 N10
description: Pleasant public sports field near the road, equipped with a fountain with drinking water. Useful for a quick break

title: (2100) Coruche - 5 N251
description: Parking in the village church, noisy day and night, no fence height, far from the center, rather quiet, we spent the night with no problem with trash and drinking fountain beside

title: (2475) Benedita - 20 Rua do Lapeirão
description: Large park, for travelers, truckers to park for rest or sleep. Restaurant / cafe open 24/24, with WC and free shower for guests. The property has a bakery. The park has charging stations for electric cars (Tesla and communes).

name: Área Serviço Autocaravanas da Erra
title: (2100) Área Serviço Autocaravanas da Erra
description: Installation specially designed for motorhomes. Part of an outdoor "pay" parking network. Check the website on the information board at the entrance. Google will probably take you down a dirt road with a narrow bridge. Suggest finding an alternate route if you have a large vehicle. On the edge of a quiet village.

title: (2380) Malhou - CM1442
description: Parking lot of the Praia Fluvial Olhos D'Agua in an olive grove. Shady and flat places available. You have to try something out. At Praia Fluvial, which is about 3 minutes from the parking lot, there are toilets, cold showers, trash cans, a bar / restaurant and tent camping next to the river bath. There are no facilities at the parking lot itself. A road leads past the parking lot and is also used at night. It can be noisy at the weekend, as the Praia is very busy in summer. Unfortunately there is rubbish everywhere.

title: (2380) - CM1442
description: WC, picnic tables, view of the river, beautiful place!

title: (2630-300) Arruda dos Vinhos - 7 Rua Manuel Silvestre
title_short: (2630-300) Arruda dos Vinhos - 7 Rua Manuel Silvestre
description: Very nice place, well equipped and with a beautiful view of the valley! I recommend !

description: Campervan Area Ecopark da Serra de São Julião

title: (2540) Carvalhal - Rua Senhor Jesus
description: Nice picnic spot by a church, just a little further down the road opposite a restaurant at a bend there is a much larger area with many tables where an overnight seems possible and lots of shade.

title: (2540) Carvalhal - Unnamed Road

title: (2630) Santiago dos Velhos - Forte da Carvalha
title_short: (2630) Santiago dos Velhos - Forte da Carvalha

title: (2540) Bombarral -
description: (ASA de BOMBARRAL) - free service area with overnight parking for ten motorhomes (some shadows, others not) about 200 m behind the hypermarket Modelo/Continente. Quiet and safe place, with 250 m flat pedestrian access to city center (crossing railway line) and traditional grossery and municipal market. Several supermarkets around, municipal forest in city, tourist office, railway station (line to Lisboa), municipal museum, library and theater; kart race. In surrounding, ex-libris garden “Jardim Buddha Éden", in Quinta dos Louridos farm (to which there is also pedestrian access from parking through two trails and agricultural fields. Several wine farms (Quintas dos Louridos, do Sanguinhal, das Cerejeiras and da Granja) where taste is possible. Feel at home and in a family atmosphere!...

title: (2590) Sobral de Monte Agraço - 15 Campo da Feira
title_short: (2590) Sobral de Monte Agraço - 15 Campo da Feira
description: New area, all facilities. At the weekend you should not stay overnight because of the adjacent disco.

title_short: (2565-587) Outeiro da Cabeça - 1 Rua do Pavilhão Gimnodesportivo

title_short: (2475-150) Benedita - 207 Rua da Fábrica da Sola

title: (2475-126) Benedita - 23 Rua 16 de Maio
description: Only vehicles up to 3500kg.  Free parking spaces on a tree-lined road.  Adjacent to a beautiful children's playground, small square, garden with benches.  On the other side of the gas station self-service washing machines with free wifi.  At 5 minutes walking distance from the center.

title: (2615-097) Alverca do Ribatejo - 11 Rua César Augusto Gonçalves Ferreira
title_short: (2615-097) Alverca do Ribatejo - 11 Rua César Augusto Gonçalves Ferreira
description: Enclosure of the park's weekly market. Parking on Saturdays from midnight to 6 p.m. is prohibited. During the day it is calm. Spacious place, good to take a break. There are a lot of shops nearby: restaurants, banks, shops, Lidl, etc ... Could possibly serve as an alternative to visiting Lisbon by public transport, including train.

title: (2140) Chamusca - 4 N118
description: Free full service served by intermarche. the service is located in the supermarket car park.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: This is a nice place to have a lunch. And see the Ribatejo

title: (2565) Maxial - 1 Rua Bartolomeu Perestrelo
description: Quiet place in a dead end street in front of it are some parking spaces. I had a quiet night. At the edge of the forest where you can go for a nice walk. Playground is there too.

title: (2615) Alverca do Ribatejo - 129 Rua António Sérgio
title_short: (2615) Alverca do Ribatejo - 129 Rua António Sérgio
description: We stoped for lunch, lovely park alongside. No signs to say you could not overnight. Three other campers were here. Good shade, reasonable flat. Playgrounds for children and adults. Tennis court and picnic tables in the shade

title: (2615) Alverca do Ribatejo - R. Irene Lisboa
title_short: (2615) Alverca do Ribatejo - R. Irene Lisboa
description: Public park. No forbidden signs. Train station next. 15/20 minutes till Lisbon center by train.

title: () - Rua do Barreiro
description: Nature, panorama and tranquility! Corner to explore! Other places surely as nice as this one, chosen at random when leaving the summit route. Worth a visit for the villages with countless small stone walls characteristic of the place. In the heights of the natural park with magnificent views of the plains and surely on the Nazaré Sea (for us covered by a cloud bank in the distance). The site is at the entrance to one of the park's hikes, and has a pretty stone vestige and two uninhabited houses (one of which is open to the winds) in the middle of the pines. Not a cat in the middle of August, seems very little frequented (the foot!). Windy, very pleasant in hot weather, a little less on an evening of bad weather.

title: (2590) Forte do Alqueidão - N115
description: Location in the heart of nature. Parking place for visitors to the Lines of Torres Vedras. Dirt road to get here, rutted, but passable to smaller vans, PCVs. Wind turbine close by of that bothers you.

title: (2565-206) Dois Portos - 67 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Cosy outdoor kitchen with picknick tables, fireplace and a sink combined. toilet as well.

title: (2565) Dois Portos - 56 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Fountain with water. Canisters have a lot of space, the water jet is also so that they can be filled quickly. And a small nice café next door.

Grátis, calmo, tranquilo e seguro. Sem serviços. Bom para pernoita durante a feira da Golegã, embora concorrido. A 5 minutos a pé do centro da Cidade.

Free, quiet, quiet and safe. No services. Good for overnight stay during the fair of Golegã, although crowded. 5 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (2510) Gaeiras - IP6

Water, tables, artisanal barbecue (provide grill). Easy access. Proximity to Obidos. There are some spaces to park also between trees for a sprinter. Bit of noise from the highway. Mountain bike singletrack trails within 5 minutes on the smaller dirt tracks down towards the barragem.

title: (2140) Ariolas - Unnamed Road

so you can park here in exchange for your farm help!
Phone number available to Pro subscribers
we do not provide any electricity and water...
u only work for a place where u can stand.

title: (2140) - 2 N243

At the entrance to the village of Chouto Nationale 243, new motorhome area, gray and black water drainage, water tap, 12 electricity outlets (currently disabled).
200 meters from the center where there is pharmacy, restaurants, small supermarket.
Quiet, easy access to any size motorhome.
On-site garbage can is very small but just outside the gate is a bigger blue bin that is also a garbage can (see last photo).
